attributes.action: A petition regarding the appalling PIP/DLA and ESA system
attributes.additional_details: You only have to look at the way people are assessed, where they have on the previous DLA system been awarded the higher rate for help getting around, and the middle or lower rate of care, and now they get either standard/standard or no PIP award whatsoever
attributes.background:
A petition regarding the appalling PIP/DLA and ESA system and the way assessments are carried out and reports are inaccurate.
Disabled people are being hammered down by these insane, unfair assessments,

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you are concerned about PIP assessments, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to change. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. Alternatively, you may wish to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/244329
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/243775
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/258169
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/255921
